name: Avoid calling a function in a termination loop
description: Reports all JavaScript code that call a function in a loop termination. This rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCPEM-PRF-4 recommendation.
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: When calling a function in a end loop, the function will be computed for each loop iteration and will decrease dramatically performances.
reference:
AJAX in Action - Manning - ISBN 1-932394-61-3 page 290 
CISQ OMG
remediation: Use a variable to store the result of a function and use it as the loop termination.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance

qualityStandards.name: Resource-consuming operation in loop
qualityStandards.description: Remove instances where an operation causing consumption of platform resource (messaging, lock, file, stream, directory, etc.) is directly or indirectly called within a loop body or within a loop condition
